text: Jisas kamavata ambami, Ñɨŋi arɨkimbat hañɨndu ninɨndaya nɨŋuva ambami maña andɨmi, vami. Kamavahi ambamu, Kima hama, vamu. Kamavahu Jisas nurɨŋ ambami, Narɨŋ yi kandɨ ambin, kru gavaman ndamarɨm tɨmbahɨrɨs mɨŋamɨŋa haŋɨnɨŋ, naŋga navundi kru mɨŋavɨŋgɨrɨvɨŋgɨrɨ haŋɨnɨŋ wɨsa Gotɨndu tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨmandɨyu.
